promqlQuery.value:
sum(increase(calls_total_total{status_code="STATUS_CODE_ERROR"})) by (service_name)
/
sum(increase(calls_total_total)) by (service_name)
or on() vector(0)

sum(increase(calls_total_total{status_code="STATUS_CODE_ERROR"})) by (span_name)
/
sum(increase(calls_total_total)) by (span_name)
or on() vector(0)

dataprimeQuery.text: source spans | groupby $m.timestamp / $p.timeRange.suggestedInterval as timestamp agg count() as count
